mapper.select: select b.bnum, b.btype1, b.btype2, b.btitle, b.bcontent, b.bimage, b.bdate, b.breport, h.hname, h.haddr, m.mid, m.mnickname from board b, host h, member m where b.hname=h.hname and b.mid=m.mid

select mbnum, mbtitle, mid, mbcontent, mbtag, mbperson, mblocation, mbimage, to_char(mbstartdate,'yyyy-mm-dd')mbstartdate, to_char(mbdate,'yyyy-mm-dd')mbdate, mbreport, mbstatus, mbresult from matchingboard

select b.bnum, b.btype1, b.btype2, b.btitle, b.bcontent, b.bimage, b.bdate, b.breport, h.hname, h.haddr, m.mid, m.mnickname, count(bc.bnum) cnt from board b, host h, member m, boardcomment bc where b.hname=h.hname(+) and b.mid=m.mid and b.bnum=bc.bnum(+)
and b.btype1='유저조행기'
and b.btype1='유용한정보'
and b.btype1='낚시지식인'
and b.btype1='자유게시판'
group by b.bnum, b.btype1, b.btype2, b.btitle, b.bcontent, b.bimage, b.bdate, b.breport, h.hname, h.haddr, m.mid, m.mnickname order by b.bdate desc
select ibnum,ibtitle,ibname,mid,ibcontent,ibmoney,ibimage,ibstatus,ibdate,ibreport from itemsboard order by ibdate desc
mapper.update: update board set breport=breport+1 where bnum=#{bnum}
update itemsboard set ibreport=ibreport+1 where ibnum=#{ibnum}
mapper.select: select * from (select h.hnum, r.hname, h.himage, substr(haddr,'1','2') haddr, count(r.hname) cnt from reservation r, host h where r.hname=h.hname group by h.hnum, r.hname, h.himage, h.haddr order by 3 desc) where rownum <=10
select bcnum,bnum,mnickname,bccontent,bcdate from boardcomment where bnum=#{bnum} order by bcdate desc
select icnum, ibnum, mnickname, iccontent, icdate from itemscomment where ibnum=#{ibnum} order by icdate desc
